title: Truth Social in limbo as merger partner grapples with another failed vote
description: Digital World needed 65 percent of its shareholders to vote in support of giving the merger with Truth Social another year. But not enough voted by Thursday's deadline and it was unclear what the next step would be.

title: Gaming charity cancels Florida event citing covid, ‘Don’t Say Gay’ law
description: Games Done Quick has canceled its in-person event in Florida, citing the state's covid-19 protocol and Parental Rights in Education Act ("don't say gay" law).

title: ‘Women make awesome games.’ This camp is helping them make more.
description: Girls Make Games founder Laila Shabir wants her young campers to make games they want to play.

title: Elijah Wood supports diverse ‘Rings of Power’ cast after racism backlash
description: “Middle-earth is not all white,” said the makers of Amazon's “The Rings of Power” series after some cast members faced racial abuse.

title: iPhone 14 hands on: Apple leans into safety, and fear
description: You might relish a few nifty tech improvements, but don’t upgrade your iPhone thinking it will save your life.
